name: Darkless (Proto)
description:
(Warning: the menu of the game is in spanish)

In this game, you control Nameless, an old ghost from the the forgotten town of Forevenevert. After a failed ritual, he got stuck inside a lamp. Now, he has to go to the town's temple before the clock hits 1 a.m. and gets trapped forever inside his new body. Will Nameless have the courage and ability to solve this situation?

The game is composed of 3 stages, with the final one having a time limit. All these places are covered in a pitch black darkness, so you will have to use your special ability to bring light for a limited time. If you lose all your lives, you restart from the beginning of the game. 

This is the first game that I worked in, so feedback is appreciated.

Enjoy!

Controls: 

a - move left 

d - move right

space bar - jump

g - use special ability (charge complete)
